languages.text:
The target of {g|f:33c8c9db91694ca6ad3eff26e36dd0af}Finest Hour!{/g} gains more {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g}:
-<indent=5%>All {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g} are immediately removed from the target.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the target cannot die (its {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} cannot be reduced below 1).</indent>
languages.original_text: Цель Час пробил! получает больше {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусов{/g}: -С цели немедленно снимаются все {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}негативные эффекты{/g}. -Цель не может умереть до конца следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}офицера{/g} (значение ее {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} не может опуститься ниже 1).

traits.locale_text:
- All negative effects are immediately removed from the target.
- Until the end of the Leader's next turn, the target cannot die (its wounds cannot be reduced below 1).

The target of It's Your Time! gains more bonuses: -All negative effects are immediately removed from the target. -Until the end of the Leader's next turn, the target cannot die (its wounds cannot be reduced below 1).

The target of Finest Hour! gains more {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g}: -All {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g} are immediately removed from the target. -Until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the target cannot die (its {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} cannot be reduced below 1).

The target of Finest Hour! gains more {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g}: -All {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g} are immediately removed from the target. -Until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the target cannot die (its {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} cannot be reduced below 1).

languages.text:
Цель {g|f:33c8c9db91694ca6ad3eff26e36dd0af}Час пробил!{/g} получает больше {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусов{/g}:
-<indent=5%>С цели немедленно снимаются все {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}негативные эффекты{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Цель не может умереть до конца следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}офицера{/g} (значение ее {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} не может опуститься ниже 1).</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Цель {g|f:33c8c9db91694ca6ad3eff26e36dd0af}Час пробил!{/g} получает больше {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусов{/g}:

-<indent=5%>Цель не может умереть до конца следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}офицера{/g} (значение ее {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} не может опуститься ниже 1).</indent>
Цель Час пробил! получает больше бонусов: -С цели немедленно снимаются все негативные эффекты. -Цель не может умереть до конца следующего хода лидера (значение здоровья не может опуститься ниже 1).

languages.text:
受{g|f:33c8c9db91694ca6ad3eff26e36dd0af}决战时刻！{/g}影响的盟友获得更多{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加成{/g}效果：
- <indent=5%>该盟友立刻净化所有{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}负面效果{/g}。</indent>
- <indent=5%>直到{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}军官{/g}的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束之前，目标盟友不会被击杀（{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}不会降至1点以下）。</indent>
languages.original_text:
The target of {g|f:33c8c9db91694ca6ad3eff26e36dd0af}Finest Hour!{/g} gains more {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g}:
-<indent=5%>All {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g} are immediately removed from the target.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the target cannot die (its {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} cannot be reduced below 1).</indent>

traits.locale_text: 受轮到你了！影响的盟友获得更多{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加成{/g}效果： - 该盟友立刻净化所有负面效果。 - 直到领袖的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束之前，目标盟友不会被击杀（{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}不会降至1点以下）。

languages.text:
El objetivo de {g|f:33c8c9db91694ca6ad3eff26e36dd0af}¡Mejor momento!{/g} recibe más {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificaciones{/g}:
-<indent=5%>Todos los {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}efectos negativos{/g} del objetivo se eliminan inmediatamente.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Hasta el final del próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}oficial{/g}, el objetivo no puede morir (sus {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} no pueden caer por debajo de 1).</indent>
languages.original_text:
The target of {g|f:33c8c9db91694ca6ad3eff26e36dd0af}Finest Hour!{/g} gains more {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g}:
-<indent=5%>All {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g} are immediately removed from the target.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the target cannot die (its {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} cannot be reduced below 1).</indent>

traits.locale_text: El objetivo de ¡Mejor momento! recibe más {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificaciones{/g}: -Todos los {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}efectos negativos{/g} del objetivo se eliminan inmediatamente. -Hasta el final del próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del oficial, el objetivo no puede morir (sus {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} no pueden caer por debajo de 1).

languages.text:
Das Ziel von {g|f:33c8c9db91694ca6ad3eff26e36dd0af}Größte Stunde!{/g} erhält mehr {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Boni{/g}:
-<indent=5%>Alle {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negativen Effekte{/g} werden sofort von dem Ziel entfernt.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Bis zum Ende des nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Offiziers{/g} kann das Ziel nicht sterben (seine {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} können nicht unter 1 reduziert werden).</indent>
languages.original_text:
The target of {g|f:33c8c9db91694ca6ad3eff26e36dd0af}Finest Hour!{/g} gains more {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g}:
-<indent=5%>All {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g} are immediately removed from the target.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the target cannot die (its {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} cannot be reduced below 1).</indent>

traits.locale_text: Das Ziel von Größte Stunde! erhält mehr {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Boni{/g}: -Alle {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negativen Effekte{/g} werden sofort von dem Ziel entfernt. -Bis zum Ende des nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} des Offiziers kann das Ziel nicht sterben (seine {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} können nicht unter 1 reduziert werden).

languages.text:
La cible d'{g|f:33c8c9db91694ca6ad3eff26e36dd0af}Heure de Gloire !{/g} obtient des {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} supplémentaires :
-<indent=5%>Tous les {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}effets négatifs{/g} que subissait la cible sont immédiatement supprimés.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Jusqu'à la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant de l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}officier{/g}, la cible ne peut pas mourir (ses {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} ne peuvent pas être réduites à moins de 1).</indent>
languages.original_text:
The target of {g|f:33c8c9db91694ca6ad3eff26e36dd0af}Finest Hour!{/g} gains more {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g}:
-<indent=5%>All {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g} are immediately removed from the target.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the target cannot die (its {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} cannot be reduced below 1).</indent>

traits.locale_text: La cible d'À Vous de Jouer ! obtient des {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} supplémentaires : - Tous les effets négatifs que subissait la cible sont immédiatement supprimés. - Jusqu'à la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant du Leader, la cible ne peut pas mourir (ses {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} ne peuvent pas être réduites à moins de 1).

languages.text: 絶好調！のターゲットが得る{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}が増加する： -ターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}マイナス効果{/g}をすべて即座に解除する。 -{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}士官{/g}の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了まで、ターゲットは死亡しなくなる（{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}が1未満にならなくなる）
languages.original_text: The target of Finest Hour! gains more {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g}: -All {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g} are immediately removed from the target. -Until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the target cannot die (its {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} cannot be reduced below 1).

traits.locale_text: 絶好調！のターゲットが得る{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}が増加する： -ターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}マイナス効果{/g}をすべて即座に解除する。 -{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}士官{/g}の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了まで、ターゲットは死亡しなくなる（{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}が1未満にならなくなる）

languages.text:
{g|f:33c8c9db91694ca6ad3eff26e36dd0af}Vakit Geldi!{/g} kabiliyetinin hedefi daha fazla {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} kazanır:
-<indent=5%>Hedefin üzerindeki tüm {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}olumsuz etkiler{/g} anında kalkar.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Subay{/g}'ın bir sonraki {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} sonuna dek hedef ölemez ({g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanları 1'in altına inemez).</indent>
